## DrawPointTool class

绘制点

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DrawPointTool<O extends DrawPointToolOptions, E extends DrawBaseEvents> extends DrawBase<O, E>
```

**Extends:** [DrawBase](./cesium.drawbase.md)<!-- -->&lt;O, E&gt;

## Example

```ts
const tool = new DrawPointTool(options)

tool.enable()

tool.eventBus.on('left-click', onLeftClick)
tool.eventBus.on('mouse-move', onMouseMove)
tool.eventBus.on('right-click', onRightClick)
tool.eventBus.on('left-dbclick', onLeftDBClick)
```

## Methods

| Method                                         | Modifiers | Description                                |
| ---------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| [clear()](./cesium.drawpointtool.clear.md)     |           | 清空绘制结果，等待下轮绘制                 |
| [destroy()](./cesium.drawpointtool.destroy.md) |           | 销毁                                       |
| [enable()](./cesium.drawpointtool.enable.md)   |           | 启用                                       |
| [stop()](./cesium.drawpointtool.stop.md)       |           | 传递本轮绘制结果，不再绘制，不清空绘制结果 |
